body_html:
Hm, actualy bazel goes offline after a minute after ./configure by itself. One does not need even to run bazel info.
Last logs in c61d2ac558d6d30ef2694b9af72e4144/java.log (if it will help)

body:
Hm, actualy bazel goes offline after a minute after `./configure` by itself. One does not need even to run `bazel info`.
Last logs in `c61d2ac558d6d30ef2694b9af72e4144/java.log` (if it will help)
```
Feb 21, 2017 9:24:53 PM com.google.devtools.build.lib.query2.AbstractBlazeQueryEnvironment evaluateQuery
INFO: Spent 30208 milliseconds evaluating query
Feb 21, 2017 9:24:54 PM com.google.devtools.build.lib.server.GrpcServerImpl$RunningCommand close
INFO: Finished command 62e1361d-67d3-4e47-ad0a-17183ec6adde on thread grpc-command-0
```
